Events that occurred on 25 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 29.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien sends an angry letter to a German publisher, after being asked whether he was Aryan or not.
1979 - Bryan Cogman is born.
1980 - Mythcon 11 at University of Nevada, Reno.
1987 - Mythcon 18 at Marquette University, Milwaukee.
1991 - Voice actor Brian Haines dies.
2002 - The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien is published.
2003 - Mythcon 34 in Nashville, Tennessee.
2005 - Tolkien's Mighty Pen is published.
2009 - Tolkien Thing 2009 in Rieneck, Germany.
2023 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) opens at the Watermill Theatre in Newbury, West Berkshire.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Th√©oden travels toward Edoras
